TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapDecoder Inherits BitmapDecoder

Docs.summary: Defines a decoder for Portable Network Graphics (PNG) encoded images.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.IO.Stream bitmapStream, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCreateOptions createOptions, valuetype System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption cacheOption) cil managed

The cache method to use for the bitmap image.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad>快取選項，如果您想要關閉`bitmapStream`建立解碼器之後。 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand>快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到需要點陣圖並清理工作由記憶體回收行程。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的執行個體，並使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.PngBitmapDecoder>從檔案資料流。 使用已解碼的映像的來源<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控制項。
[!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: The is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] encoded image.
